author: jleroux
msg: Inconsistencies related to the "java -jar ofbiz.jar" commands when used with arguments https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5872
-both    -----> Run simultaneously the POS (Point of Sales) application and OFBiz standard
-pos     -----> Run the POS (Point of Sales) application
[no command] -> Start the server w/ default config
But actually only the -help, -status and -shutdown command need a dash.
For now we decided to change the documentation generated by the help command to remove dashes when they are not needed.
When done, we will try to have things consistent and re-add the missing dashes to the commands and in the help. Then the "Technical production setup guide" should be updated, pfew...

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-6747: Add an optional caching option as a workaround for SOLR-6586.

author: jfthomps
msg: VCL-776 - rework resource code to have a base class for all resources and inheriting classes for each resource type
-modified connectmethodDialogContent and subimageDialogContent: changed text at bottom of dialog from "Confirm Changes" to "Submit Changes" to properly reflect text on button

-modified AJsaveResource: removed [$data['imageid']] key when referencing $olddata; $olddata is not indexed by imageid, it is just the data for a specific image; this was causing imagemeta information to get messed up when clicking the Save Changes button

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-4185 The org.apache.sling.xss bundle should properly export its API
Applying slightly modified patch by Radu Cotescu (Thanks alot).
